QuestionJSON.Question:
Ellis is working on a program that processes the financial transactions of a small business. They want to develop a code snippet that calculates the total inventory cost, given the number of items and their costs. The code also applies a discount if the total cost exceeds a certain value. What will the function totalCost(3,10) return when the threshold value is set to 25 and the discount is 10%?

1integer totalCost(integer items, integer cost)
2
integer threshold = 25
3
integer total = items * cost
4
if total > threshold
5
total = total - total * 0.1
6
end
7
return total
8end
QuestionJSON.Explanation: The function totalCost(3,10) calculates the total cost of the items by multiplying the number of items by the cost per item (3*10=30). Since this cost exceeds the threshold value of 25, it applies a discount of 10%. This discount calculates as 30-30*0.1=27, so the function returns 27.
QuestionJSON.Code_Snippet:
1integer totalCost(integer items, integer cost)
2
integer threshold = 25
3
integer total = items * cost
4
if total > threshold
5
total = total - total * 0.1
6
end
7
return total
8end
